title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Flipped Learning-Based English Collocation Knowledge Improvement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and use over 200 essential English collocations (lexical/grammatical) related to their specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) contextually
Learners can demonstrate collocation utilization proficiency with over 80% accuracy through online discussions and formative assessments
Learners can consistently perform provided video lectures (70%) and interactive activities (30%) in a flipped learning model at least three times weekly
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
